name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commity AI: Chat with page - Conversational ChatGPT AI assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converse with AI (OpenAI ChatGPT or Anthropic Claude) about the page, summarize, translate, transform text, fill forms ...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An OpenAI (ChatGPT) or Anthropic Claude powered extension which lets you ask contextual questions on any website, converse with AI about the page, summarize content, translate text, transform content, extract links, extract links or tables, ask to fill forms ...

An AI power tool for everyone.

Freshly added:
- Clickable follow-up suggestions. The AI will suggest several inquisitive questions or follow up actions for you to do.
